entry.title: $2500 // 2 Bed in heart of Crown Heights near bars, restaurants, Prospect Park
entry.content:
Spacious 2 bed 1 bath unit in the heart of Crown Heights near Butter & Scotch, Franklin Park, Chavella's, Aita, Crown Inn & more. Both rooms fit queen sized rooms and has closet space. Renovated. Photos of similar unit. No Fee!

Trains: 2,3,4,5 @ Franklin Ave and S-Shuttle that connects you to the B/Q at Prospect Park or C at Franklin Ave.

Amenities:
Hardwood Floors
Outdoor Space
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Built in microwave

Call/text/email to schedule a viewing! Thanks! Jonathan: show contact info

entry.title: $1800 // 423 Lincoln Place- Huge studio apartment!
entry.content: 423 Lincoln Place is huge studio apartment located on the second floor in Prospect Heights neighborhood. This apartment is in a prime location between Lincoln Pl and St Johns Pl. It is approximately 2-3 blocks from the Washington Ave & Eastern Pkwy 2&3 Trains and 1-2 blocks from the St Johns Pl/Washington Av B45 Bustop. In close proximity to the apartment there are several commercial areas to shop as well like grocery stores, restaurants and bars. This newly renovated studio apartment is truly a renter's dream; consisting of separate living room and kitchen area, stainless steel appliances, and abundance of natural lighting. 423 Lincoln place is a lovely unit that will not last long! Contact Mac for a showing today! show contact info
